title: Minor change of notification behaviour.
message:
Minor change of notification behaviour.

Style is now always set to BigTextStyle, so that single new events can
be read in their entirety.

title: Change behaviour when no data connection is available.
message:
Change behaviour when no data connection is available.

Instead of waiting for data connection to return, which has a tendency
to fail on Android 7.0, we now just bail out instead, showing an error
if the update was initiated from the GUI.

Solves #15

title: Add (limited) support for shipments that are split into multiple parcels.
message:
Add (limited) support for shipments that are split into multiple parcels.

The ID of an individual parcel must be the ID entered into the app, and the app
will then track that parcel. The data received from the API contains info about
all the items, which made the app confused before.

title: Switch to a better API from PostNord.
message:
Switch to a better API from PostNord.

This API is more officially supported, and can find parcels the old one couldn't.
It requires a "consumer ID", which due to their rules must be kept secret, so it's not included in the open source code. Requesting a consumer ID for a fork is, however, very simple (there's a link in ParcelJsonParser.java).

The new API has so far not been tested thoroughly, but the current code works without issues for my saved collection of mixed parcel ID:s. Of course, most of those parces have already been delivered...

This update will wipe the events table in the database, since the two API:s differ a lot in representation there (would result i duplicate events otherwise).

title: Major UI revamp. Now Fragment based with Tablet support.
message:
Major UI revamp. Now Fragment based with Tablet support.

Most of the UI code is now simpler with less weird pointers floating around. :)
This should work fully, but may contain bugs or minor weirdness.

title: Fix initial value of progress dialog after rotating screen.
message:
Fix initial value of progress dialog after rotating screen.

Also fix some comments.

title: Modernize the RefreshDialog code as well.
message:
Modernize the RefreshDialog code as well.

This also removes the (very non-Android-ish) DialogAwareListActivity, and uses
Android's built in support for similar handling (in DialogFragment).

However, to simplify some stuff, it's (temporarily, I hope) replaced with a
RefreshContextListActivity (only to deduplicate some bits of code, that should
be possible to handle in other ways after a Fragment transition of the UI.

title: Fix refresh of individual parcels.
message: Fix refresh of individual parcels.

title: Major modernization of ParcelIdDialog.
message:
Major modernization of ParcelIdDialog.

Now based on DialogFragment instead, removing the need for
BarcodeListeningListActivity and, partly, DialogAwareListActivity (RefreshDialog
still uses it, but not for long).

For the user, there is no noticeable change, but removal of
DialogAwareListActivity is somwehat needed for a Fragment based tablet UI.

title: Nicer isValidFragment() implementation.
message: Nicer isValidFragment() implementation.

title: Preferences overhaul.
message:
Preferences overhaul.

* Better use of fragments, dividing the preferences into two separate fragments.
* New method for disabling automatic updates (compatible with the old method).
* Collect the default values for all preferences in one place (constants.xml).
* Some minor enhancements to preference strings.
